page.title: 01ENERGY-GAS-MORECAMBE BAY.
page.content: Off the South Cumbrian coast lies the Morecambe gasfield.The field contains an estimated 140,000 million cubic metres of gas,making it one of the largest gasfield around the shores of Britain. The Morecambe field will be especially important in meeting the future needs of gas customers throughout Britain.Unlike other fields Morecambe was discovered and is being developed by a company-Hydrocarbons Great Britain Limited-which is owned by British Gas. First suplies of the Morecambe gas came in the winter of 1984/5.In the late 1980's.When the Morecambe field is at it's peak there will be ten percent extra than the sufficient amount of the demand at that time.The gas will supply no less than seven million central heating systems.
